name: lawks
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of surprise: Lawks, this road is narrow!
More examplesFewer examplesLawks, girl! Whatever are you doing?He tried (lawks!) to kiss her!She asked me what I wanted. Lawks. I couldn't think of anything.Lawks! What to do?
